service.name: Hiru-kuru (Daily Deli)
service.description:
Smart Lunch
with our Takeout-Only Service

benefit.title: Benefits for distributors
benefit.description1: Through Hiru-kuru, you can reach more customers and increase sales.
benefit.description2: You can efficiently manage orders and inventory through a simple management system.
benefit.description3: You can collect opinions through genuine buyer reviews.

benefit.title: Client's Benefits!
benefit.description1: Explore a variety of bento (lunch box) options and combinations at a glance through our website or app, bringing more variety and enjoyment to your daily lunch experience.
benefit.description2: Through advance orders, you can enjoy meals that are convenient, efficient, and served warm.
benefit.description3: Feel confident in choosing our bentos by checking reviews from other satisfied customers.

detail.title: What is HiruKuru?
detail.content: Takeout service that streamlines access to your daily lunch by bringing together sellers and buyers under a single app

usage.title: How to use
usage.description1: Pick an item that suits your tastes
usage.description2: Order and payment are both conveniently processed from within the app
usage.description3: Collect your food from the shop at the designated time
